q: House, Mike Pence said Republicans ''welcome the president's call'' for Social Security reform. ''I think the only danger House Republicans have today is in not being bold enough,'' he said. I think the American people are tired of half-measures. They're looking for men and women at every level of government who are willing to step up and speak the truth and to offer positive solutions to deal with the fiscal crisis that we're facing. That includes domestic spending. That includes reasonable pruning and efficiencies within our defense complex. But it also includes entitlement reform. Tom Watson, a Labour lawmaker, said the Andy Coulson controversy raises questions about David Cameron 's judgment and should trigger a deeper investigation of Murdoch's media empire. The New Sarah Ferguson Times quoted Watson as saying: Spin and obfuscation is all we get from Downing Street-we need to get to the truth. Chrysler CEO Sergio Marchionne said he hopes to receive the funds by the end of March. The automaker is going ahead with fuel-efficiency projects, expecting it will receive the loan to help pay for them. I can't stop the machine, Sergio Marchionne said recently. the ''narrative'' that later emerged-- that Colin Powell was misled into making his false declarations in his UN speech-- he notes that the former Donald Rumsfeld of State was fully aware of all the intelligence. Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody, nor did he lie about Saddam Hussein 's suspected WMD stockpiles. The Barack Obama did not lie. The Vice Barack Obama did not lie... the far less dramatic truth is that we were wrong. As for the decision to not send more troops to Iraq in the wake of the invasion, Donald Rumsfeld accuses his accusers. the Eagles' Michael Vick , Ben Roethlisberger might be toughest quarterback to sack, said Jets defensive end Shaun Ellis. ''He's very strong. He's very elusive in the pocket,'' Ellis said. Michael Jordan previous high was 58 against Houston on Jan. 15, 2002. I score a career high and we won the game, Allen Iverson said. ''That's how you draw it up in your dreams.''
